mapper.select: SELECT id,date_format(start_time,'%Y-%c-%d') as time, FORMAT(amount/100,2) as amountZh,FORMAT(commission/100,2) as commissionZh,ratio,status from shop_commission where shop_id=#{shopId} order by start_time DESC

from shop_commission sc,shop s WHERE sc.shop_id=s.id and sc.id=#{id} and s.user_id=#{userId} and sc.status=0

SELECT tj.* FROM (SELECT count(*) as order_num,SUM(so.amount) as amount,sum(so.commission) as commission,so.shop_id,so.ratio as ratio from shop_order so where DATE_FORMAT(so.order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >=#{startTime} and DATE_FORMAT(so.order_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<= #{endTime} and so.`status`=1 group by so.shop_id ORDER by so.order_time DESC) tj LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sc.shop_id from shop_commission sc where DATE_FORMAT( sc.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >=#{startTime} and DATE_FORMAT(sc.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<= #{endTime}) yy on tj.shop_id=yy.shop_id where ISNULL(yy.shop_id) OR yy.shop_id = "";
